articles.author: ROD MCGUIRK
articles.title: A social media ban for under-16s passes the Australian Senate and will soon be a world-first law - The Associated Press
articles.description: The Australian Senate has passed a social media ban for young children that will soon become a world-first law. The law will make platforms including TikTok, Facebook, Snapchat, Reddit, X and Instagram liable for fines for systemic failures to prevent childre…
articles.content:
MELBOURNE, Australia (AP) 
A social media ban for children under 16 passed the Australian Senate Thursday and will soon become a world-first law.
The law will make platforms including TikTok, Faceb… [+5346 chars]
